New Records: The United States defeated Canada by 230 runs in their earlier T20I match in April 2024.
The United States has a strong home record at Grand Prairie Stadium, winning six of their seven T20I matches there.
Key Match Events: The match is the opening of the T20 World Cup, renewing a historical rivalry between the United States and Canada.
Pre-Game Insights: United States vice-captain Aaron Jones emphasized a 'fearless' approach to the tournament.
Canada captain Saad Bin Zafar also expressed a desire to play entertaining and expressive cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The United States and Canada are both debutants at the men's T20 World Cup.
The match is part of a month-long global event featuring 20 teams.
